description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2015
http://gotochgo.com

Martin Thompson - High-Performance Computing Specialist

ABSTRACT
What does it really mean to design software for high-performance? Performance is such a generic and misunderstood subject. In this talk the subject of performance will be explored. We will focus on what is means to achieve [...]
